title: Email Marketing Designer – Figma Expert Needed for Ecommerce Brand
job_overview:
Looking for an ecommerce email designer.

You need to KNOW how to use Figma.

If you have experience with Emailify, that would be great to mention as well! Use the word "TENTION" within your proposal to be considered, and make sure to add your Figma link for your previous work.

OVERVIEW:
Create 8 email designs a day
40 hours a week
Collab with team
Deep understanding of design principles and how to structure designs to hold audience attention and get a sale
Able to fully understand a client’s brand tone and create eye-catching designs based on that


QUALIFICATIONS:
Can effectively communicate in English
Is extremely familiar with email design strategy
Have had at least 1 year experience with email design
